medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp pain in the epigastric region radiating to the back, associated with nausea/vomiting and decreased oral intake.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started 1 week ago and has been persistent since, with recent emesis of oral contents and no bowel movement in 4 days. The intensity of pain is sharp.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HTN, insomnia, mitral regurgitation, osteoporosis, renal insufficiency, cataracts, DVT, spondylosis, hyperlipidemia, carpal tunnel; unknown back surgery, appendectomy, TAH, BSO.
